General.Name: Migros Ticaret AS
General.Description: Migros Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail sale of food and beverages, and consumer and durable goods. The company operates Migros Sanal Market, an online food retailing website, as well as Tazedirekt.com, an online shopping website. It also sells its good through stores, shopping centers, Ramstores Banner abroad, and internet. Migros Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: AtatUerk Mahallesi Turgut Oezal, Istanbul, Turkey, 34758
